data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Achituv, Yair, Hosie, Andrew M. (2013): Trevathana noae, a new species of coral inhabiting barnacle (Cirripedia: Thoracica: Pyrgomatidae). Zootaxa 3731 (1): 106-112, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3731.1.4
